LanguageData.VFEP_GrapplingHook.label: grappling hook
LanguageData.VFEP_GrapplingHook.description: Grappling hook connects to walls and solid rock and allows the users to quickly move to the desired location. The launcher does not require ammunition, but time needs to be reserved between shots to wind it up again.
LanguageData.VFEP_GrapplingHook.modExtensions.0.label: reload grappling hook
LanguageData.VFEP_GrapplingHook.verbProperties.label: grappling hook
LanguageData.VFEP_SiegeMode.label: Siege Mode
LanguageData.VFEP_SiegeMode.description: Drill yourself into the ground in order to gain more stability and turn yourself into a stationary artillery unit, increasing the attack range and reload efficiency drastically.
LanguageData.VFEP_SiegeMode.verbProperties.label: Siege Mode
LanguageData.VFEP_PowerJump.label: Power jump
LanguageData.VFEP_PowerJump.description: Use shoulder-mounted jump packs to travel a short distance and create a small explosion at both start and end of the flight.
LanguageData.VFEP_PowerJump.verbProperties.label: Power jump
LanguageData.VFEP_BlastOff.label: Blast off
LanguageData.VFEP_BlastOff.description: Fire a large propulsion engine strapped to the back of your armor and designate a location on the world map to drop pod into. This will create a large explosion at the destination, but will most likely leave you stranded without fuel for the trip back.
LanguageData.VFEP_BlastOff.verbProperties.label: Blast off
